item.title: Gadwal Court Quashes False Cases Against Congress Leaders After Seven Years
item.description:
<![CDATA[Gadwal: The Gadwal Court has finally dismissed two long-pending cases filed against Congress leaders from Ieeja mandal and town, marking the end of a seven-year legal battle. These cases were registered during the TRS (now BRS) government against Congress activists for organizing democratic rallies and protests.
One of the cases was filed in 2018 against Master Sheik Shavali Achari, the State Official Representative, and leader Maddileti, at the time of their joining the Congress Party. The the...]]>
item.author: M Veeresh
